unit.data.timnit.name: Timnit <size=60%><color=red>Champion</color></size>
unit.data.timnit.lore: Timnit is the highest representative of the Druidic Order. Timnit lived a long life and thought he had seen it all until new creatures started appearing out of nowhere wreaking havoc in the Kingdom.
unit.data.timnit.cost.recruit.descriptio: Base cost Leadership {0} but Reputation impact is doubled
unit.data.timnit.combo.2.rewards.name: Champion's Influence (Timnit)
unit.data.timnit.description.visuals: Humanoid sized green turtle, standing up. Old and serious looking. Large spiky shell on its back. Wearing all sorts of silver jewelery, necklaces, braces and bracelets. Large silver belt with a blue circular jewel in the center. Holding a wooden staff with an blue octopus sitting on top of it.
